titleStmt.title: The dutifull advice of a loving sonne to his aged father
titleStmt.author: Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Beniamin Fisher, dwelling in Aldersgate- street at the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Southwell by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
An extract from Southwell's "An epistle of a religous priest unto his father", first printed in his "A short rule of a good life."--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: tightly bound, pages 37-40 lacking; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
